1370: Hildeburgis moved to Muurhuysen2.C.6 after marriage.
Got married to Kerstiaen at age 14 in 1370.
Gave birth to Frethericus in 1370 at age 14.
1371: Gave birth to Trueb in 1371 at age 15.
1372: Gave birth to Segherarden in 1372 at age 16.
Lost daughter Segherarden when Segherarden was 1 years old.
1374: Lost son Trueb when Trueb was 4 years old.
1375: Gave birth to Niels in 1375 at age 19.
1384: Gave birth to Rolant in 1384 at age 28.
1386: Gave birth to Menoldis in 1386 at age 30.
Lost daughter Menoldis when Menoldis was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Lost son Ivone when Ivone was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Ivone in 1387 at age 31.
1388: Gave birth to Wouter in 1388 at age 32.
1392: Gave birth to Imma in 1392 at age 36.
1395: Died while giving birth to Woutersoet in 1395 at age 39.
